sentences.sContent: They bounced me into paying the bill in cash.
sentences.sCn: 他们胁迫我用现金付账。

sentences.sContent: They also paid for their second house in cash.
sentences.sCn: 他们还是用现金支付他们第二个房子。

sentences.sContent: The competition awards prizes in cash and business services to student entrepreneurs, who devise best business plans for new ventures.
sentences.sCn: 这次竞赛用现金和商业服务来奖励为新企业制订最佳商业规划的学生企业家。
